mail_body:
Dear James Cameron,

I am excited to apply for the position of Senior Python Developer at PWC that was advertised on Stepstone. As a reliable and determined individual with exceptional attention to detail, I feel my skills are well-suited to this role.

As a Payroll Manager for KWS GmbH, I worked extensively with Excel and payment processes, utilizing various computer software. Possessing an MSc in Finance from Harvard University, I have gained expertise in payroll and finance, and I consistently demonstrate critical thinking as well as a willingness to learn.

In addition to being a native Italian speaker and fluent in English and Romanian, I am familiar with coding and enjoy playing with computers in my spare time. As a Senior Python Developer, I am confident that I have the necessary skills to develop innovative and efficient software solutions to help drive digital transformation for PWC Deutschland.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

Jude Smiley
